bio.specialization: I specialize in full-stack development with React, Preact, Redux, Next.js, Angular, Vue and Nuxt.js, as well as mobile development with React Native. I have extensive experience in backend development with Node.js, Express, Python, and database management with MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Firebase. My expertise includes UX/UI design, responsive design, and agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban. My goal is to combine aesthetic design with clean and efficient code, following principles like SOLID, DRY, KISS and BEM to create digital experiences that impress and work perfectly.
